gaps_found.message: Build Plan Coverage Matrix uses test ID format UT-001-001/UT-TECH-001/UT-NFR-001 etc. but Test Plan uses sequential format UT-001 through UT-065. Cross-references between documents will not match.

Build Plan Agent Distribution summary table shows incorrect task counts (Agent 1: 8 listed vs 10 actual, Agent 3: 7 listed vs 10 actual, Agent 6: 7 listed vs 6 actual). Summary table does not match actual detailed task assignments.

Test descriptions in TEST_PLAN.md are intentionally brief but some do not fully enumerate all acceptance criteria from the spec (e.g., UT-009 for useTheme hook mentions state and toggle but not localStorage/data-theme/OS detection ACs). Test implementations should cover all ACs.

UT-015 description says Button variants (primary, secondary, ghost, danger) but spec REQ-004-001-001 defines 5 variants: Primary, Secondary, Ghost, Destructive, Accent. Description uses danger instead of Destructive and omits Accent.
TECH-004 (Hardcoded color cleanup) in Phase P3 assigned to Agent 4 is a broad cross-cutting task that overlaps with P4 page migration work. Consider coordinating execution order carefully.

design_reviewer.reviewer_result: PASS - All checks passed in cycle 3/4

analyze_phase.note: Base section compliance 58.8%. LLM penalties excessive for large documents. Schema validation clean. 3 design reviews completed.

_schema.description: SBX Design Execution Log - Tracks all steps and ensures enforcement
